attributes.action: Provide an Email service to the Prime Minister.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Provide the general public with the facility to email the Prime Minister. Communication is vitally important today and the ability to email is an available and cost effect method commonly available to British households.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
